title: logo-dataizer
text: Convert logos or icons into scatterplots of “datapoints”

title: logo-dataizer
text:
How to use
https://davegrays.github.io/logo-dataizer/
initialize

from logo_dataizer.scatterizer import Scatterizer
scatterizer = Scatterizer()

run scatter() on any image type, just giving the filepath

scatterizer.scatter("../data/cloud.png")







By default, the output will be saved in the same location with “_scatterized” appended to the filename
The following settings can be modified (defaults are in the docstring)

number of points to generate
amount of scatter
opacity
point size
size of the output image

e.g.

scatterizer.scatter(
    "../data/cloud.png",
    n_samples=800,
    var=0.3,
    alpha=0.4,
    width=4,
)








colors = scatterizer.scatter(
    "../data/pytorch_logo.png",
    n_samples=1200,
    var=0.3,
    alpha=0.25
)
